name: 黃玲媛
objective:
The course surveys the principles of chemistry and properties of matter which interest the engineers most. It will place more emphasis on conceptual understanding. It is designed to provide the chemical engineering major the background in modern chemistry that students need to serve their professional interests.
Course Outline:
1. Introduction: Matter and Measurement
2. Chemical Nomenclature　　
3. Atoms, Molecules, and Ions
4. Chemical Stoichiometry: Calculations with Chemical Formulas and 
   Chemical Equations　　
5. Aqueous Reactions and Solution Stoichiometry
6. Thermochemistry　　
7. Electronic Structure of Atoms
8. Periodic Properties of the Elements
